ticker: Join us for live DJs mixing every weekend!
Join our VRChat group or visit us on Bluesky for news on our next events.

event.top: Who let you all in early?! This is...
ticker: Welcome to our first Friday night event of the year! Join us today and tomorrow for live mixes!
Please can all passengers be mindful of on-going station improvements and resist the urge to use construction cones as a hat. Thank you.

performers.name: DJ Tasha Nicole
ticker: Please welcome our first new DJ tonight, calling at Hard Techno and Hardstyle!
'I'm DJ Tasha and now it's your problem!'

performers.name: Juicy Sushi
ticker: 'Experience the taste of music with JuicySushi'

performers.name: Yomi
ticker: Please welcome our second new DJ tonight!
'I've seen God in some dirty faces'

performers.name: Oktopu5
ticker: Final DJ of the night now boarding...
'did you try turning it off and on again?'

performers.name: **TERMINATES HERE**
ticker: Check back tomorrow for more Bass Station!
This Bass Station is comprised of two coaches... I mean, evenings! That's right, two of them!
Check out our posters at spawn or at the back wall of the station concourse for our full timetable this weekend!
